        <script  type="text/javascript">
            // ensures js doesn't die if ads service fails.  
            // Note that we need to define the js here, since ad js is being rendered inline after this.
            (function(f) {
                // Fallback javascript, when the ad Service call fails.  
                
                if((window.csm == null || window.generic == null || window.consoleLog == null)) {
                    if (window.console && console.log) {
                        console.log("one or more of window.csm, window.generic or window.consoleLog has been stubbed...");
                    }
                }
                
                window.csm = window.csm || { measure:f, record:f, duration:f, listen:f, metrics:{} };
                window.generic = window.generic || { monitoring: { start_timing: f, stop_timing: f } };
                window.consoleLog = window.consoleLog || f;
            })(function() {});
        </script>

        csm.measure('csm_TitleAwardsWidget_finished');
      }
    </script>

    if (typeof uet == 'function') {
      uet("be", "TitleAwardsWidget", {wb: 1});

        <h2>Storyline</h2>
        
        <div class="inline canwrap">
            <p>
                <span>    Ed Hemsler spends his life preparing for a disaster that may never come. Ronnie Meisner spends her life shopping for things she may never use. In a small town somewhere in America, these two people will try to find love while trying not to get lost in each other's stuff.</span>
            </p>
        </div>

    </div>

    <p>Find showtimes, watch trailers, browse photos, track your Watchlist and rate your favorite movies and TV shows on your phone or tablet!</p>

            window.mediaViewer.weblab = JSON.parse('{"IMDB_MEDIAVIEWER_NIX_MODAL_210629":"T1"}');
        } catch (error) {
            if (window.ueLogError) {
                window.ueLogError(error, {
                    logLevel: "WARN",
                    attribution: "mediaviewer",
                    message: "Failed to parse weblabs for media viewer."
                });
            }
        }
    </script>

        <script  type="text/javascript">
            // ensures js doesn't die if ads service fails.  
            // Note that we need to define the js here, since ad js is being rendered inline after this.
            (function(f) {
                // Fallback javascript, when the ad Service call fails.  
                
                if((window.csm == null || window.generic == null || window.consoleLog == null)) {
                    if (window.console && console.log) {
                        console.log("one or more of window.csm, window.generic or window.consoleLog has been stubbed...");
                    }
                }
                
                window.csm = window.csm || { measure:f, record:f, duration:f, listen:f, metrics:{} };
                window.generic = window.generic || { monitoring: { start_timing: f, stop_timing: f } };
                window.consoleLog = window.consoleLog || f;
            })(function() {});
        </script>

        <h2>Storyline</h2>
        
        <div class="inline canwrap">
            <p>
                <span>    Twenty-seven years after their first encounter with the terrifying Pennywise, the Losers Club have grown up and moved away, until a devastating phone call brings them back.</span>
            </p>
        </div>

        <script  type="text/javascript">
            // ensures js doesn't die if ads service fails.  
            // Note that we need to define the js here, since ad js is being rendered inline after this.
            (function(f) {
                // Fallback javascript, when the ad Service call fails.  
                
                if((window.csm == null || window.generic == null || window.consoleLog == null)) {
                    if (window.console && console.log) {
                        console.log("one or more of window.csm, window.generic or window.consoleLog has been stubbed...");
                    }
                }
                
                window.csm = window.csm || { measure:f, record:f, duration:f, listen:f, metrics:{} };
                window.generic = window.generic || { monitoring: { start_timing: f, stop_timing: f } };
                window.consoleLog = window.consoleLog || f;
            })(function() {});
        </script>

            <h3 class="parent"><span class="leftarrow">&#9668; </span><a href="/poll/">IMDb Polls</a></h3>
<div class="poll active ask" data-pollid="-pK3rSmR-hw" >
    <h1>Poll: TV Shows Ending in 2019</h1>
    <div class="byline">A poll by <a href="/user/ur45394926/">Dibyayan_Chakravorty</a>.</div>
    <div class="description">Which of these TV shows that are ending in 2019 will you miss the most?<p>After voting, <b><a href="https://getsatisfaction.com/imdb/topics/poll-suggestion-tv-shows-ending-in-2019">you may discuss the poll here</a>.</b></div>
    <div class="article">

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/imdb/js/collections/common-3979391882._CB465795254_.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/imdb/js/collections/jquery-3230852380._CB459228541_.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/G/01/imdb/js/collections/consumersite-3635526467._CB464439679_.js"></script>



            <script type="text/javascript">
            function jQueryOnReady(remaining_count) {
                if (window.jQuery && typeof $.fn.watchlistRibbon !== 'undefined') {
                    jQuery(
                                function() {
           var facebookTheme = (window.custom && window.custom.full_page && window.custom.full_page.theme) ? window.custom.full_page.theme : "light",
               url = "https://www.facebook.com/widgets/like.php?width=280&show_faces=1&layout=standard&href=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.imdb.com%2Fpoll%2F-pK3rSmR-hw%2F%3Fref_%3Dpo_sn&colorscheme=" + facebookTheme,
               like = document.getElementById('iframe_like');
           if (like) {
              like.src = url;
              like.onload = function () { generic.monitoring.stop_timing('facebook_like_iframe', '', false); };
           }
            $(document)
                .delegate('.dynamic-social-share-widget button.facebook', 'click', function() {
                    var $widget = $(this).closest('.dynamic-social-share-widget');
                    var params = [
                        "u="+$widget.data('url'),
                    ].join("&");
                    var url = "https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?" + params;
                    window.open(url, 'newWindow', 'width=815, height=436');
                    return false;
                })
                .delegate('.dynamic-social-share-widget button.twitter', 'click', function() {
                    var $widget = $(this).closest('.dynamic-social-share-widget');
                    var url = "https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text="+$widget.data('twitter-description') + " " + $widget.data('url');
                    window.open(url, 'newWindow', 'width=815, height=436');
                    return false;
                })
                ;
        }

                    );
                } else if (remaining_count > 0) {
                    setTimeout(function() { jQueryOnReady(remaining_count-1) }, 100);
                }
            }
            jQueryOnReady(50);
            </script>

    }
</script>
        
    </body>
</html>
<script type="text/javascript">
(function($) {
    var unloading = false;
    $(window)
    .unload(function() {unloading = true;})
    .on("pageshow", function() {
        $('.poll').trigger('reset');
    });
    $('.toggle-overflow').each(function(i, e) {
        var $e = $(e);
        var naturalHeight = parseInt($e[0].scrollHeight);
        var collapsedHeight = parseInt($e.css('maxHeight'));
        if (naturalHeight <= collapsedHeight) {
            return;
        }
        var $button = $e.next();
        $button
            .data('naturalHeight', naturalHeight)
            .data('collapsedHeight', collapsedHeight)
            .css('visibility', 'visible');
    });
    $(document)
    .delegate('.toggle-overflow-button', 'click', function(e) {
        var $button = $(this);
        var $target = $button.prev();
        $button.css({opacity: 0.1});
        var collapsed = $button.hasClass('collapsed');
        var targetHeight = $button.data((collapsed) ? 'naturalHeight' : 'collapsedHeight');
        $target.animate(
            {'maxHeight' : targetHeight + "px"},
            250,
            function() {
                $button.toggleClass('collapsed');
                $button.css({opacity: 1});
            }
        );
        e.returnValue = false;
        return false;
    })
    .delegate('.poll .answer .vote', 'click', function(e) {
        e.returnValue = false;
        var $answer = $(this).closest('.answer');
        var $poll = $answer.closest('.poll');
        if (!$poll.hasClass('active')) {
            return false;
        }
        var pollId = $poll.data('pollid');
        var userId = $poll.data('userid');
        var answerId = $answer.data('answerid');
/*
        if (userId == undefined) {
            document.location.href = '/poll/' + pollId + '/results?answer=' + answerId + '&ref_=po_nr';
            return false;
        }
*/
        $poll.removeClass('active');
        var $zoom = $('.zoom', $answer);
        if ($zoom.length == 0) {
            $answer.trigger('vote');
            return false;
        }
        $zoom.show();
        $answer.addClass('zoomed');
        e.returnValue = false;
        return false;
    })
    .delegate('.poll .answer .zoom button.zoom-vote', 'click', function(e) {
        $(this).closest('.zoom').hide();
        $(this).closest('.answer').trigger('vote');
    })
    .delegate('.poll .answer .zoom button.cancel', 'click', function(e) {
        $(this).closest('.poll').trigger('reset');
    })
    .delegate('.poll .answer', 'vote', function(e) {
        var $answer = $(this).closest('.answer');
        var $poll = $answer.closest('.poll');
        var $sweepstakes = $('.sweepstakes', $poll);
        var userId = $poll.data('userid');
        var pollId = $poll.data('pollid');
        var answerId = $answer.data('answerid');
        $answer.addClass('spinning');
        if (userId == undefined) {
            if ($sweepstakes.length > 0) {
                $sweepstakes.trigger('open');
            } else {
                document.location.href = '/poll/' + pollId + '/results?answer=' + answerId + '&ref_=po_nr';
            }
            return;
        }
        $.ajax({
            url: '/poll/' + pollId + '/',
            dataType: 'json',
            type: 'POST',
            data: {
                answerId: answerId
            },
            error: function(xhr) {
                if (unloading || xhr.readyState == 0) {
                    return;
                }
                alert("Error, please try again");
                $poll.trigger('reset');
            },
            success: function(data) {
                if (data.status == 200) {
                    $poll.addClass('finished');
                    if ($sweepstakes.length > 0) {
                        $sweepstakes.trigger('open');
                    } else {
                        document.location.href = '/poll/' + pollId + '/results?answer=' + answerId + '&ref_=po_rv';
                    }
                    return;
                }
                alert("Error, please try again");
                $poll.trigger('reset');
            }
        });
    })
    .delegate('.poll', 'reset', function() {
        $(this).addClass('active');
        $('.answer', $(this)).removeClass('spinning', 'zoomed');
        $('.zoom', $(this)).hide();
        $('.sweepstakes', $(this)).hide();
    })
    .delegate('.sweepstakes', 'open', function() {
        var $sweepstakes = $(this);
        var $answer = $('.answer.spinning');
        var answerText = $('.answer-text', $answer).text();
        var pollId = $sweepstakes.closest('.poll').data('pollid');
        var answerTextRegExp = new RegExp(encodeURIComponent("\$\{answerText}"), "g");
        var pollIdRegExp = new RegExp(encodeURIComponent("\$\{pollId}"), "g");
        $('.social a', $sweepstakes).each(function(i,a) {
            var url = $(a).attr('href').replace(answerTextRegExp, answerText).replace(pollIdRegExp, pollId);
            $(a).attr('href', url);
        });
        $sweepstakes.trigger('reset').show();
    })
    .delegate('.sweepstakes', 'reset', function() {
        var $sweepstakes = $(this);
        $('input', $sweepstakes).val('');
        $('input:checked', $sweepstakes).prop('checked', false);
        return false;
    })
    .delegate('.sweepstakes .action a', 'click', function(e) {
        var enterSweepstakes = $(this).hasClass('submit');
        var $sweepstakes = $(this).closest('.sweepstakes');
        var $answer = $('.answer.spinning');
        var answerId = $answer.data('answerid');
        var $poll = $answer.closest('.poll');
        var pollId = $poll.data('pollid');
        var $form = $('form', $sweepstakes);
        if (enterSweepstakes) {
            var data = {};
            var hasError = false;
            $.each(['first-name', 'last-name', 'email', 'email2', 'phone'], function(i, field) {
                var value = $('.'+field + ' input').val().trim();
                data[field] = value;
                if (value != null && value.length == 0) {
                    $('.' + field, $form).addClass('error');
                } else {
                    $('.' + field, $form).removeClass('error');
                }
            });
            if (data['email'] != data['email2']) {
                $('.email2', $form).addClass('error');
            }
            if ($('.terms input', $form).prop('checked')) {
                $('.terms', $form).removeClass('error');
            } else {
                $('.terms', $form).addClass('error');
            }
            if ($('.error', $form).length > 0) {
                return;
            }
            $form.submit();
            return;
        }
        $sweepstakes.hide();
        document.location.href = '/poll/' + pollId + '/results?answer=' + answerId + '&ref_=po_rv';
    })
    .delegate('.poll .answer .toggle-overflow a', 'click', function(e) {
        e.ignoreEvent = true;
    })
    ;
})(jQuery);
</script>

        <script  type="text/javascript">
            // ensures js doesn't die if ads service fails.  
            // Note that we need to define the js here, since ad js is being rendered inline after this.
            (function(f) {
                // Fallback javascript, when the ad Service call fails.  
                
                if((window.csm == null || window.generic == null || window.consoleLog == null)) {
                    if (window.console && console.log) {
                        console.log("one or more of window.csm, window.generic or window.consoleLog has been stubbed...");
                    }
                }
                
                window.csm = window.csm || { measure:f, record:f, duration:f, listen:f, metrics:{} };
                window.generic = window.generic || { monitoring: { start_timing: f, stop_timing: f } };
                window.consoleLog = window.consoleLog || f;
            })(function() {});
        </script>
  <script>

      csm.measure('csm_head_delivery_finished');

        <p class="divider-text"><span>or</span></p>

        <div class="list-group">
          <a href="https://www.imdb.com/ap/register?openid.return_to=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.imdb.com%2Fap-signin-handler&openid.identity=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&openid.assoc_handle=imdb_us&openid.mode=checkid_setup&siteState=eyJvcGVuaWQuYXNzb2NfaGFuZGxlIjoiaW1kYl91cyIsInJlZGlyZWN0VG8iOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5pbWRiLmNvbS9saXN0L3dhdGNobGlzdD9yZWZfPWxvZ2luIn0&openid.claimed_id=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0%2Fidentifier_select&openid.ns=http%3A%2F%2Fspecs.openid.net%2Fauth%2F2.0&tag=imdbtag_reg-20" class="list-group-item create-account ">Create a New Account</a>
        </div>

        <div id="signin-notice"><p class="text-center"><small>By signing in, you agree to IMDb's <a href="/conditions">Conditions of Use</a> and <a href="/privacy">Privacy Policy</a>.</small></p></div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div id="signin-perks">
    <h1>Benefits of your free IMDb account</h1>
        <div class="signin-teaser"></div>
    <p><strong>Personalized Recommendations</strong><br />Discover shows you'll love.</p>
    <p><strong>Your Watchlist</strong><br />Track everything you want to watch and receive e-mail when movies open in theaters.</p>
    <p><strong>Your Ratings</strong><br />Rate and remember everything you've seen.</p>
    <p><strong>Contribute to IMDb</strong><br />Add data that will be seen by millions of people and get cool badges.</p>

If you are a long time Pokémon fan you will love this movie, but if you don\u0027t like Pokémon, if Pokémon doesn\u0027t really interest you or the small chance that you\u0027ve never heard about it, most of the movie will not be very interesting. There\u0027s a lot of inside jokes and the likes. I\u0027m not saying you need large amount of Pokémon knowledge to watch this movie, but if you need to google Mewtwo or Psyduck to know what they are, then this movie is most likely not for you.\n\nOkay, enough about that. This movie is the best game adaptation I\u0027ve seen to date. It\u0027s funny, the visual effects are amazing and it has heart when it wants to. There is something for all ages. Pikachu is adorable and Ryan Reynolds is really great. The human actors are unfortunately this movies weak point. Justice Smith is good and Bill Nighy is Bill Nighy, but the rest are not great and mostly not believable (they\u0027re not terrible though), fortunately they don\u0027t get that much screentime. The plot is good, but a bit predictable (gets a little wierd in the end).\n\nJust to clear up my thoughts, Ryan Reynolds and the Pokémons really makes this movie for me.             // ensures js doesn't die if ads service fails.  
            // Note that we need to define the js here, since ad js is being rendered inline after this.
            (function(f) {
                // Fallback javascript, when the ad Service call fails.  
                
                if((window.csm == null || window.generic == null || window.consoleLog == null)) {
                    if (window.console && console.log) {
                        console.log("one or more of window.csm, window.generic or window.consoleLog has been stubbed...");
                    }
                }
                
                window.csm = window.csm || { measure:f, record:f, duration:f, listen:f, metrics:{} };

                window.consoleLog = window.consoleLog || f;

    <div class="plot_summary ">
            <div class="summary_text">
                    In a world where people collect Pokémon to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent talking Pikachu who seeks to be a detective.
            </div>

    <div class = "article" id="titleStoryLine">
    <span class=rightcornerlink >
            <a href="/register/login?why=edit"
rel="login">Edit</a>
    </span>
    
        <h2>Storyline</h2>
        
        <div class="inline canwrap">
            <p>
                <span>    The story begins when ace detective Harry Goodman goes mysteriously missing, prompting his 21-year-old son Tim to find out what happened. Aiding in the investigation is Harry's former Pokémon partner, Detective Pikachu: a hilariously wise-cracking, adorable super-sleuth who is a puzzlement even to himself. Finding that they are uniquely equipped to communicate with one another, Tim and Pikachu join forces on a thrilling adventure to unravel the tangled mystery. Chasing clues together through the neon-lit streets of Ryme City--a sprawling, modern metropolis where humans and Pokémon live side by side in a hyper-realistic live-action world--they encounter a diverse cast of Pokémon characters and uncover a shocking plot that could destroy this peaceful co-existence and threaten the whole Pokémon universe.</span>
            </p>
        </div>
        
        <span class="see-more inline">

    <div id="titleDidYouKnow" class="article">
    <span class=rightcornerlink >
            <a href="/register/login?why=edit"
rel="login">Edit</a>
    </span>
        <h2>Did You Know?</h2>
    <div id="trivia" class="txt-block">
        <h4>Trivia</h4>
    The second trailer came one day before the reveal trailers of <a href="/title/tt9910948">Pok&eacute;mon Sword</a> (2019) and <a href="/title/tt9866210">Pok&eacute;mon Shield</a> (2019), the start of the 8th Generation of Pokémon for the Nintendo Switch/the first main series Pokémon games playable on TV Screens released later on in 2019.        <a href="trivia"
class="nobr" >See more</a>  &raquo;
    </div>
                <hr />
     <div id="goofs"  class="txt-block">
        <h4>Goofs</h4>
In one scene, Tim mentions something about &quot;Greninjas being set free.&quot; The plural form of a Pokemon is the same as the singular form, so he should have seen the &quot;Greninja were being set free.&quot; Other characters in the movie get this right.        <a href="trivia?tab=gf"
class="nobr" >See more</a>  &raquo;
    </div>   
                <hr />
    <div id="quotes" class="text-block">
        <h4>Quotes</h4>
<a href="/name/nm1105980/"
><span class="character">Lucy Stevens</span></a>:
Down by the docks. Rough part of town, not the sorta place you wanna visit alone at night.
<br /><a href="/name/nm6819854/"
><span class="character">Tim Goodman</span></a>:
[<span class="fine">trying to impress her</span>]
Well, I'm actually pretty good at being alone at night.
<br />        <a href="trivia?tab=qt"
class="nobr" >See more</a> &raquo;
    </div>
                <hr />
     <div id="crazyCredits"  class="txt-block">
        <h4>Crazy Credits</h4>
    The closing credits appear in a sequence of manga/anime images of events/characters from the film. The characters mimic the artwork of lead Pokémon series designer, Ken Sugimori.        <a href="trivia?tab=cz"
class="nobr" >See more</a>  &raquo;
    </div>   
                <hr />
    <div id="connections" class="text-block">
        <h4>Connections</h4>
        References <a href="/title/tt0096895">Batman</a>&nbsp;(1989)


        <a href="trivia?tab=mc"
class="nobr" >See more</a> &raquo;
    </div>

    <div class="article" id="titleUserReviewsTeaser">
        <h2>User Reviews</h2>
        <div class="user-comments">
                    <div class="tinystarbar" title="8/10">
                        <div style="width: 80px;">&nbsp;</div>
                    </div>
                <span>
                    <strong>Great! If you like Pokémon.</strong>
                    <div class="comment-meta">
                        5 May 2019 | by <a href="/user/ur44400607/"
><span>peterhye-nielsen</span></a>
                        &ndash; <a href="/user/ur44400607/comments"
>See all my reviews</a>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        <p>As the titel says, this movie is great, but only if you like Pokémon.
If you are a long time Pokémon fan you will love this movie, but if you don&#39;t like Pokémon, if Pokémon doesn&#39;t really interest you or the small chance that you&#39;ve never heard about it, most of the movie will not be very interesting.
There&#39;s a lot of inside jokes and the likes. I&#39;m not saying you need large amount of Pokémon knowledge to watch this movie, but if you need to google Mewtwo or Psyduck to know what they are, then this movie is most likely not for you.<br/><br/>Okay, enough about that. This movie is the best game adaptation I&#39;ve seen to date. It&#39;s funny, the visual effects are amazing and it has heart when it wants to. There is something for all ages. Pikachu is adorable and Ryan Reynolds is really great. The human actors are unfortunately this movies weak point. Justice Smith is good and Bill Nighy is Bill Nighy, but the rest are not great and mostly not believable (they&#39;re not terrible though), fortunately they don&#39;t get that much screentime.
The plot is good, but a bit predictable (gets a little wierd in the end).<br/><br/>Just to clear up my thoughts, Ryan Reynolds and the Pokémons really makes this movie for me.
For me it&#39;s an 8 out of 10.<br/><br/>Hope this helps any potential moviegoer.</p>
                    </div>
                </span>
                <hr />

        </span>



            <script type="text/javascript">
                if(typeof uex === 'function'){uex('ld','NinjaWidget',{wb:1});}

        <script  type="text/javascript">
            // ensures js doesn't die if ads service fails.  
            // Note that we need to define the js here, since ad js is being rendered inline after this.
            (function(f) {
                // Fallback javascript, when the ad Service call fails.  
                
                if((window.csm == null || window.generic == null || window.consoleLog == null)) {
                    if (window.console && console.log) {
                        console.log("one or more of window.csm, window.generic or window.consoleLog has been stubbed...");
                    }
                }
                
                window.csm = window.csm || { measure:f, record:f, duration:f, listen:f, metrics:{} };
                window.generic = window.generic || { monitoring: { start_timing: f, stop_timing: f } };
                window.consoleLog = window.consoleLog || f;
            })(function() {});
        </script>

                 <span class="lister-item-index unbold text-primary">26. </span>
<a href="/name/nm0698998"
> David Proval
</a>             </h3>
                 <p class="text-muted text-small">
                         Actor <span class="ghost">|</span>
<a href="/title/tt0070379/"
> Mean Streets
</a>                 </p>
                 <p>
    David Proval launched his acting career with a starring role in <a href="/title/tt0070379">Mean Streets</a> (1973), directed by <a href="/name/nm0000217">Martin Scorsese</a>, and has been working nonstop ever since. Notable features in which he has appeared include <a href="/title/tt0117331">The Phantom</a> (1996), <a href="/title/tt0112572">The Brady Bunch Movie</a> (1995) <a href="/title/tt0113101">Four Rooms</a> (1995) and <a href="/title/tt0111161">The Shawshank Redemption</a>...                 </p>

                         Actor <span class="ghost">|</span>
<a href="/title/tt0120663/"
> Eyes Wide Shut
</a>                 </p>
                 <p>
    Sky du Mont was born on May 20, 1947 in Buenos Aires, Argentina as Caetano Bremme Gaspar Neven DuMont. He is an actor and writer, known for <a href="/title/tt0120663">Eyes Wide Shut</a> (1999), <a href="/title/tt0248408">Der Schuh des Manitu</a> (2001) and <a href="/title/tt0349047">(T)Raumschiff Surprise - Periode 1</a> (2004).                 </p>

                 <p>
    Joe Cocker was born on May 20, 1944 in Sheffield, Yorkshire, England as John Robert Cocker. He was married to Pam Baker. He died on December 22, 2014 in Crawford, Colorado, USA.                 </p>

> N.T. Rama Rao Jr.

                         Actor <span class="ghost">|</span>
<a href="/title/tt5098128/"
> Nannaku Prematho
</a>                 </p>
                 <p>
    N.T. Rama Rao Jr. was born on May 20, 1983 in Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh, India as Nandamuri Taraka Ram. He is known for his work on <a href="/title/tt5098128">Nannaku Prematho</a> (2016), <a href="/title/tt5946852">Janatha Garage</a> (2016) and <a href="/title/tt1661031">Brindaavanam</a> (2010). He has been married to Lakshmi Pranathi since April 5, 2012. They have two children.                 </p>

<a href="/name/nm0610831"
> Gabriele Muccino
</a>             </h3>
                 <p class="text-muted text-small">
                         Director <span class="ghost">|</span>
<a href="/title/tt0814314/"
> Seven Pounds
</a>                 </p>
                 <p>
    Gabriele Muccino was born on May 20, 1967 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is a director and writer, known for <a href="/title/tt0814314">Seven Pounds</a> (2008), <a href="/title/tt0454921">The Pursuit of Happyness</a> (2006) and <a href="/title/tt0265930">L'ultimo bacio</a> (2001). He has been married to <a href="/name/nm3749141">Angelica Russo</a> since December 22, 2012. He was previously married to <a href="/name/nm1307977">Elena Majoni</a>.                 </p>

        <script  type="text/javascript">
            // ensures js doesn't die if ads service fails.  
            // Note that we need to define the js here, since ad js is being rendered inline after this.
            (function(f) {
                // Fallback javascript, when the ad Service call fails.  
                
                if((window.csm == null || window.generic == null || window.consoleLog == null)) {
                    if (window.console && console.log) {
                        console.log("one or more of window.csm, window.generic or window.consoleLog has been stubbed...");
                    }
                }
                
                window.csm = window.csm || { measure:f, record:f, duration:f, listen:f, metrics:{} };
                window.generic = window.generic || { monitoring: { start_timing: f, stop_timing: f } };
                window.consoleLog = window.consoleLog || f;
            })(function() {});
        </script>

    <h2>Did You Know?</h2>
        <div id="dyk-personal-quote" class="see-more inline canwrap">
                <h4 class="inline">Personal Quote:</h4>
    I love ghosts, I prefer ghosts to some people.                    <span class="see-more inline">
                        <a href="/name/nm0000333/bio#quotes"
>See more</a> 
                    </span>

            <hr/>
        <div id="dyk-trivia" class="see-more inline canwrap">
                <h4 class="inline">Trivia:</h4>
    Songwriter <a href="/name/nm0751038">Bobby Russell</a> had initially offered the song "The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia" to <a href="/name/nm0000333">Cher</a> for her to record. However, when he brought a demo recording to her she was out shopping and asked her husband <a href="/name/nm0095122">Sonny Bono</a> to listen to it. After listening to it, Sonny told Russell that he not only would he allow Cher to do the song, but he also thought it would cause her to lose fans in the...                    <span class="see-more inline">
                        <a href="/name/nm0000333/bio#trivia"
>See more</a>
                    </span>
                    &raquo;
        </div>

            'itemsPerShovel' : 2,
            'paginate' : false,
            'useExternalCSS' : true,
            'width' : '100%'
        });
    }

                    );
                    jQuery(
                                function() {
           var isAdvertisingThemed = !!(window.custom && window.custom.full_page && window.custom.full_page.theme),
               url = "https://www.facebook.com/widgets/like.php?width=280&show_faces=1&layout=standard&href=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.imdb.com%2Fname%2Fnm0000333%2F&colorscheme=light",
               like = document.getElementById('iframe_like');

           if (!isAdvertisingThemed && like) {
              like.src = url;
              like.onload = function () {
                  if (typeof uex == 'function') { uex('ld', 'facebook_like_iframe', {wb: 1}); }
              };
           } else if (isAdvertisingThemed) {
              $('.social_networking_like').closest('.aux-content-widget-2').hide();
           }
        }

                    );
                } else if (remaining_count > 0) {
                    setTimeout(function() { jQueryOnReady(remaining_count-1) }, 100);
                }
            }
            jQueryOnReady(50);
            </script>


        
        <div id="servertime" time="296"/>



<script>
    if (typeof uet == 'function') {
      uet("be");
    }
</script>
        
    </body>
</html>
